trans-unit.source: Kovadom is a home sale booking platform. On Kovadom you can simply choose the atmosphere and the brand to organize a moment of friendliness.
Our team is attentive to your questions or needs throughout the booking process
With Kovadom, organize your sale in just a few clicks!

the ambiance you would like to share

confirm your reservation in one click.
